text: "I'll Go Crazy" is a 1960 R&B; song by James Brown and The Famous Flames. Released as a single from their album Think! and from their live album Live at the Apollo. It went to number 73 in the United States in 1966 and has been covered by numerous artists over the years. ==References== Category:1960 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:James Brown songs Category:Tommy James and the Shondells songs Category:The Kingsmen songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:The Moody Blues songs Category:The Residents songs Category:Buddy Guy songs Category:Chris Isaak songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: I'll Go Crazy (James Brown song)
